Plot: Three bumbling Army reservists bound for Iraq are accidentally dropped at Mexican village besieged by hostile forces.
Title: Delta Farce
Actors: Michael Rose, Glenn Morshower, Larry the Cable Guy, Christina Moore
tomatoConsensus: Too afraid to be a real satire of the Iraq War, Delta Farce instead devolves into a reprehensible, unfunny mix of slapstick, gay panic, and flatulence jokes.
